name: EnergyCloud
0:
”Alexa ask EnergyCloud how much electricity I am using”
”Alexa ask EnergyCloud what my electricity rate is”
”Alexa ask EnergyCloud what my meter status is”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energycloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
EnergyCloud enables you to understand your home, or small business, electricity usage in real time. With the PowerCost Monitor hardware, EnergyCloud delivers up-to-the-minute electricity usage information in dollar-and-cents as well as showing month-over-month comparisons with a projection for the current month, appliance level breakdowns and weekly and monthly progress reports. EnergyCloud will even send you alerts for things that need your attention right away.

Using the EnergyCloud skill you will be able to ask Alexa for your electricity usage information.

In order to use this skill you must link it to your EnergyCloud account. When you enable the skill the account linking process will be initiated. Simply follow the prompts to create a new EnergyCloud account, or log into your existing account, and then authorize Alexa to access your EnergyCloud information.
